results.title: Inhibition of melanogenesis by the antidiabetic metformin.
results.text_hl: These data emphasize the depigmenting effect of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ and suggest a clinical strategy for using @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ in the topical treatment of @<m>DISEASE_Hyperpigmentation</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D017495 @@@hyperpigmentation disorders@@@.
